descriptors.text: You're very imaginative, with a wide range of interests. Your thought processes are very unusual, and you can be very original.
You tend to be imaginative, and have unusual through processes. Originality is a skill of yours as well.
You're quite curious and imaginative. You probably tend to value intellectual matters more than other things.
You may not be very imaginative, and might be interested more in less intellectual matters.
Creativity and artistic matters aren't your thing, neither are highly intellectual things. You have no problem with accepted ideas and cultural concepts.
Achievement is where all your motivation comes from. You're very capable in roles assigned to you, and dutiful to any leaders.
You're most motivated by achievement, and are good at following commands from others. You're more self-disciplined than most.
You want to achieve things, and tend to obey most orders. You follow a routine and are fairly self-disciplined.
Although you may enjoy achievement, you're not too bothered by whether you achieve things or not. You also tend to be unhappy taking orders.
You're a rebel. You don't necessarily strive to achieve anything, and your rebellious nature may come across as incompetence.
You're extremely outgoing and enthusiastic. Others probably find you very assertive, and enjoy being around you.
You come across as very outgoing, enthusiastic, and assertive. Even though you might think you're depressed rarely, you'll always find a silver lining.
You're talkative and fairly energetic. You want to be doing something usually, and you're happy more often than not.
You tend to be quite quiet and prefer silence to incessant talking. Although you may not think so, you sometimes can come across as cold and unresponsive.
You always keep to yourself - being alone suits you. Talking is a waste of time for you, often.
You come across as very kind and appreciative - or at least that's how you see yourself.
You see yourself as a genuinely nice and appreciative person, and you'd hope your friends and family see you that way too.
You're a kind, forgiving and appreciative person - most of the time.
You err on the side of being slightly cynical with your friends and family. You may not be the most modest, either.
You're cynical, and tend to not be sympathetic, instead being quite harsh when talking with other people.
You're anxious and worry a lot about yourself. You may be depressive, and are probably very self-conscious.
You're quite self-conscious, and honestly a bit self-pitying. You may appear to some as slightly unstable.
You're quite self-conscious, and honestly a bit self-pitying. You may appear to some as slightly unstable.
You're generally confident and tend to not care what others think of you, though you still have some regard for your image.
You're very stable and secure in yourself, and couldn't care less what people think of you. Rarely do you worry about something.
